35 class DiffusionMatrixTests
36 {
37 public:
38 
43  static void fluxesSumToZero(Mixture& mix);
44 };
45 
46 //==============================================================================
47 
62 TEST_CASE("DiffusionMatrix yields diffusion fluxes which sum to zero",
63  "[transport][DiffusionMatrix]"
64 )
65 {
66  MIXTURE_LOOP(
67  //SECTION("Exact diffusion matrix") {
68  // mix.setDiffusionMatrixAlgo("Exact");
69  // fluxesSumToZero(mix);
70  //}
71 
72  SECTION("Ramshaw diffusion matrix") {
73  mix.setDiffusionMatrixAlgo("Ramshaw");
74  DiffusionMatrixTests::fluxesSumToZero(mix);
75  }
76  )
77 }
78 
79 //==============================================================================
80 
81 void DiffusionMatrixTests::fluxesSumToZero(Mixture& mix)
82 {
83  const int ns = mix.nSpecies();
84  VectorXd dx(ns);
85  VectorXd Ji(ns);
86 
87  const double tol = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon()*1000;
88 
89  // Test over several temperatures and pressures
90  EQUILIBRATE_LOOP(
91  // Compute temperature gradient as driving forces
92  mix.dXidT(dx.data());
93 
94  // Scale to make the temperature gradient larger and make sure they
95  // sum to zero
96  dx *= 1.0 / dx.array().abs().maxCoeff();
97  dx[0] -= dx.sum();
98 
99  // Compute the diffusion velocities
100  Ji = -mix.diffusionMatrix() * dx; // <- diffusion velocities
101  Ji.array() *= mix.density() * Map<const ArrayXd>(mix.Y(),ns);
102 
103  // Make sure the sum is zero
104  INFO("Ji = " << Ji << "\ndx = " << dx);
105  CHECK(Ji.sum() == Approx(0.0).margin(tol));
106  )
107 }
108
